title: Just Sit Right Back And You'll Hear A Tale
itunes:title: Just Sit Right Back And You'll Hear A Tale
description:
If you were stuck on a desert island, what are some of the things that you would want to have with you if your three-hour tour turned into being stranded on an uncharted desert island in the South Pacific? The boys share their top 3 on various topics.

In the first hour we will light up the Via Havana from Cuba Rica Tabacalera that was part of The Cigar Authority Care Package. In the second hour, everyone lights up their must have cigar while they wait to be rescued.

Join us for all the madness known as The Cigar Authority

As always, you can find many of the cigars discussed on the show at www.2guyscigars.com
